data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Río Negro, Argentina. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Río Negro, Argentina
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Río Negro.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 39 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Río Negro, Argentina.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, bless the state of Río Negro with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Río Negro, Argentina.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Turk people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Río Negro. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 61,101 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.section_summary:
the state of Río Negro, Argentina has a population of 552,800.

We estimate Río Negro has 61,101 people who might know Jesus, 453,604 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 38,095 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Río Negro.
